verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <WH5058> [Tbin-gi-Not, on Neginoth מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> mas-Kil Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti; to my prayer וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תִּ֝תְעַלַּ֗ם <WH5956> tit-'al-Lam, and hide מִתְּחִנָּתִֽי׃ <WH8467> mit-te-chin-na-Ti. not thyself from my supplication

הַקְשִׁ֣יבָה <WH7181> hak-Shi-vah Attend לִּ֣י li וַעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> va-'a-Ne-ni; unto me and hear אָרִ֖יד <WH7300> 'a-Rid me I mourn בְּשִׂיחִ֣י <WH7879> be-si-Chi in my complaint וְאָהִֽימָה׃ <WH1949> ve-'a-Hi-mah. and make a noise

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar, And I said מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- I יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> yit-ten- Oh that לִּ֣י li אֵ֭בֶר <WH83> 'E-ver I had wings כַּיּוֹנָ֗ה <WH3123> kai-yo-Nah, like a dove אָע֥וּפָה <WH5774> 'a-'U-fah [for then] would I fly away וְאֶשְׁכֹּֽנָה׃ <WH7931> ve-'esh-Ko-nah. and be at rest

הִ֭נֵּה <WH2009> Hin-neh Behold אַרְחִ֣יק <WH7368> 'ar-Chik far off נְדֹ֑ד <WH5074> ne-Dod; Lo [then] would I wander אָלִ֖ין <WH3885> 'a-Lin [and] remain בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אָחִ֣ישָׁה <WH2363> 'a-Chi-shah I would hasten מִפְלָ֣ט <WH4655> mif-Lat my escape לִ֑י Li; מֵר֖וּחַ <WH7307> me-Ru-ach from the windy סֹעָ֣ה <WH5584> so-'Ah storm מִסָּֽעַר׃ <WH5591> mis-Sa-'ar. [and] tempest

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor אוֹיֵ֥ב <WH341> o-Yev For [it was] not an enemy יְחָֽרְפֵ֗נִי <WH2778> ye-cha-re-Fe-ni, [that] reproached וְאֶ֫שָּׂ֥א <WH5375> ve-'Es-Sa me then I could have borne לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor מְ֭שַׂנְאִי <WH8130> Me-san-'i [it] neither [was it] he that hated עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai against הִגְדִּ֑יל <WH1431> hig-Dil; me [that] did magnify וְאֶסָּתֵ֥ר <WH5641> ve-'es-sa-Ter [himself] against me then I would have hid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. at

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh But [it was] thou a man כְּעֶרְכִּ֑י <WH6187> ke-'er-Ki; mine equal אַ֝לּוּפִ֗י <WH441> 'al-lu-Fi, my guide וּמְיֻדָּֽעִי׃ <WH3045> u-me-yud-Da-'i. and mine acquaintance

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יַ֭חְדָּו <WH3162> yach-do together נַמְתִּ֣יק <WH4985> nam-Tik We took sweet ס֑וֹד <WH5475> Sod; counsel בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit unto the house אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God נְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> ne-hal-Lech [and] walked בְּרָֽגֶשׁ׃ <WH7285> be-Ra-gesh. in company

יַשִּׁימָוֶת yash-shi-ma-vet כיַשִּׁ֤י yash-Shi ק; מָ֨וֶת <WH3451> Ma-vet let death seize קעָלֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-mov, upon יֵרְד֣וּ <WH3381> ye-re-Du upon them [and] let them go down שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol into hell חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> chai-Yim; quick כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For רָע֖וֹת <WH7451> ra-'ot for wickedness בִּמְגוּרָ֣ם <WH4033> bim-gu-Ram [is] in their dwellings בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <WH7130> be-kir-Bam. [and] among

אֲ֭נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- upon אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him upon God אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra; As for me I will call וַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> yo-shi-'E-ni. shall save

עֶ֤רֶב <WH6153> 'E-rev Evening וָבֹ֣קֶר <WH1242> va-Vo-ker and morning וְ֭צָהֳרַיִם <WH6672> Ve-tzo-ho-ra-yim and at noon אָשִׂ֣יחָה <WH7878> 'a-Si-chah will I pray וְאֶהֱמֶ֑ה <WH1993> ve-'e-he-Meh; and cry aloud וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' and he shall hear קוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> ko-Li. my voice

יִשְׁמַ֤ע׀ <WH8085> yish-Ma' shall hear אֵ֨ל׀ <WH410> 'el God וְֽיַעֲנֵם֮ <WH6031> ve-ya-'a-Nem defile וְיֹ֤שֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> ve-Yo-Shev them even he that abideth קֶ֗דֶם <WH6924> Ke-dem, of old סֶ֥לָה <WH5542> Se-lah Selah אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein there חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <WH2487> cha-li-Fot Because they have no changes לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָרְא֣וּ <WH3372> ya-re-'U therefore they fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. not God

שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sha-Lach He hath put forth יָ֭דָיו <WH3027> Ya-dav his hands בִּשְׁלֹמָ֗יו <WH7965> bish-lo-Mav, against such as be at peace חִלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> chil-Lel with him he hath broken בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> be-ri-To. his covenant

חָלְק֤וּ׀ <WH2505> chal-Ku were smoother מַחְמָאֹ֣ת <WH4260> mach-ma-'Ot than butter פִּיו֮ <WH6310> piv [The words] of his mouth וּֽקֲרָב־ <WH7128> u-ka-rov- but war לִ֫בּ֥וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo [was] in his heart רַכּ֖וּ <WH7401> rak-Ku were softer דְבָרָ֥יו <WH1697> de-va-Rav his words מִשֶּׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> mish-She-men, than oil וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah they פְתִחֽוֹת׃ <WH6609> fe-ti-Chot. yet [were] they drawn swords

הַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> hash-Lech Cast עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh upon the LORD יְהָבְךָ֮ <WH3053> ye-ha-ve-Cha thy burden וְה֪וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu and He יְכַ֫לְכְּלֶ֥ךָ <WH3557> ye-Chal-ke-Le-cha and he shall sustain לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yit-Ten suffer לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam thee he shall never מ֗וֹט <WH4131> Mot, to be moved לַצַּדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> latz-tzad-Dik. the righteous

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah O אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him But thou O God תּוֹרִדֵ֬ם׀ <WH3381> to-ri-Dem shalt bring them down לִבְאֵ֬ר <WH875> liv-'Er into the pit שַׁ֗חַת <WH7845> Sha-chat, of destruction אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> 'an-Shei men דָמִ֣ים <WH1818> da-Mim bloody וּ֭מִרְמָה <WH4820> U-mir-mah and deceitful לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יֶחֱצ֣וּ <WH2673> ye-che-Tzu shall not live out half יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3117> ye-mei-Hem; their days וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, I אֶבְטַח־ <WH982> 'ev-tach- but I will trust בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.
